basics.name: Jeremiah Carlin
basics.label: Senior Android Developer
basics.summary: Senior full stack Android developer and tech lead with a background in systems software, firmware, infrastructure, and tooling.  Detail oriented self starter that is highly adaptable and analytical.

work.summary: Developed and maintained Android code and AWS backend
highlights: Enhance and maintain Android app platform
Manage complex collection of services and microservices in AWS
Enhance and maintain codebases in PHP, MySQL, Go, Node.js, Typescript, and Python
Design and deploy services using CloudFormation and Serverless
Investigate and debug support issues using a wide range of AWS services
Work with clients to gather requirements and product ownership to define roadmap and development priorities.
Mediate between senior leadership and development team
Developed and maintained Android app platform for broadcast and print media in Kotlin and Java
Supported 6.5 million monthly active users across 500 apps
Mentored junior developers in Android best practices, code quality, and architecture
Refactored data layer from Otto to RxJava with emphasis on immutability, performance, and testing
Designed MVP based display system for self contained widgets that enabled app wide code reuse
Created custom LayoutManager for RecyclerView, custom views, animations, and a podcast service
Built out business and view logic with MVVM, MVP, and Lifecycle components
Wrote automated build system for client application customization and publication
Deployed and managed Dockerized instance of Artifactory and Jenkins for build and development

work.summary: Infrastructure management, tooling, automations, and capital planning for IBM Watson's healthcare initiative
highlights: Supported 300+ developers across 200+ systems
Scripted, tooled, and configured IBM Watson, associated middleware, and file systems
Maintained large scale network file system (GPFS)
Managed capital planning and hardware purchasing for Watson healthcare development

work.summary: Tech lead for a mobile internet optimization platform (3G mobile network edge caching)
highlights: Led software and firmware teams through requirements gathering, architecture, and delivery
Supported hardware teams and vendors through initial bringup and functional verification tests
Designed and implemented vendor support layer for embedded Linux

work.summary: Tech lead for several projects that aimed to enable cloud computing style management for IBM proprietary hardware and operating systems.
highlights: Produced and presented cloud computing competitive analysis to executive team
Developed libvirt based virtualization manager and associated management tooling
Enabled KVM image manager for IBM Systems Director
Mentored team through code reviews and architectural guidance
Wrote and conducted customer acceptance tests to collect feedback on product
Automated configuration of IBM System P VIOS to adhere to published best practices
Wrote command execution abstraction layer to support remote execution and local testing

work.summary: Refactored and enhanced service processor code for Cell based PCIe graphics card
highlights: Automated and supported hardware bringup and validation for cell based graphics card
Refactored service processor code to enhance stability and performance

work.summary: Junior developer for IBM i operating system
highlights: Developed shared memory page table for Unix style process local addressing in IBM i Operating System
Created diagnostic utilities to satisfy key client requirements
Modernized regression test bucket

references.name: Nick Campion, Director of Naviga Mobile
references.reference: Jeremiah possesses a rare combination of deep technical knowledge, burning desire to understand how things work, soft-spoken humbleness and a magnetic teaching skill that draws in teammates. Jeremiah is a natural team leader, with the ability to arbitrate between many viewpoints to build a technical consensus while keeping the overall business objectives in sight. His extensive experience creating products used by millions of users shows in everything he does. His flexibility to understand driver level mechanics all the way up the stack to cloud architecture, make him an absolute asset to any hardware or software project. His attitude about supporting his teammates and our customers made him stand-out among his fellow engineers and he is someone I truly treasured working with.
